MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.30pm to complete an underground cable repair in Slamannan and this may affect the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complex repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:54am on 6th February.
